snippet: About 30 students have learned that their plum summer jobs at the law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf have vanished, and they are now returning, hat in hand, to ask for jobs they had once rejected at other firms.
abstract: About 30 students have learned that their plum summer jobs at the law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf have vanished, and they are now returning, hat in hand, to ask for jobs they had once rejected at other firms.
